item.title: Run-Server Issue
item.dc:creator: @Cycnyg Cycnyg
item.description:
@Cycnyg wrote:

When I try opening Run-Server a cmd opens up quickly and closes and it keeps doing that until I exit it.

Here is my code in Run-Server

@echo off
title Project Insanity
java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
start Run-Server.bat
exit

Read full topic
